line.words: Intorno al mondo

subtitle.line: Rundt i verden
Reis om de wereld
Around the World
Around the World

line.words: Una mattina Emil si sveglia come di solito. Emil piace le sue abitudine. Dà sempre da mangiare al suo gatto la mattina. Ma stamattina c’è qualcosa che non va!

subtitle.line: En morgen vågner Emil som sædvanlig. Emil kan lide sine rutiner. Han fodrer altid katten om morgenen. Men her til morgen er der noget galt!
Op een dag wordt Emiel wakker, net als altijd. Emiel heeft zijn vaste gewoontes. Hij geeft zijn kat altijd ‘s morgens te eten. Maar vanochtend is er iets aan de hand!
One morning Emil wakes up as usual. Emil likes his routines. He always feeds his cat in the morning. But this morning something is wrong!
One morning Emil wakes up as usual. Emil likes his routines. He always feeds his cat in the morning. But this morning something is wrong!

line.words: Il suo gatto non c’è! Emil cerca in ogni luogo ma non riesce a trovare il suo gatto. Poi vede una nota sul tavolo da cucina.

subtitle.line: Katten er der ikke. Emil kigger over det hele, men han kan ikke finde sin kat. Så ser han en seddel på køkkenbordet.
Zijn kat is weg! Emiel kijkt overal maar hij kan hem niet vinden. Dan ziet hij een briefje liggen op de keukentafel.
His cat is not there! Emil looks everywhere but cannot find his cat. Then he sees a note on the kitchen table.
His cat is not there! Emil looks everywhere but cannot find his cat. Then he sees a note on the kitchen table.

line.words: Nella nota c’è scritta: “Se vuoi che il tuo gatto torna, devi viaggiare intorno al mondo e raccoglie tre indizi. Bisogna cominciare in Inghilterra. Cerca qualcuno che sta per andare a scuola in ogni paese che visiti.”

subtitle.line: På sedlen står der: “Hvis du vil have din kat tilbage, skal du rejse rundt i verden og samle 3 spor. Du skal starte i (Frankrig/Spanien...) Se efter en, der er på vej til skole i hvert land, du besøger”.
Er staat op: ‘Als je je kat terug wilt, zul je om de wereld moeten reizen en moet je drie aanwijzingen verzamelen. Je begint in Frankrijk. Zoek in elk land iemand die op weg naar school is.’
The note says: ‘If you want your cat back you have to travel around the world and collect 3 clues. You must start in England. Look for someone on their way to school in each country you visit.’
The note says: ‘If you want your cat back you have to travel around the world and collect 3 clues. You must start in England. Look for someone on their way to school in each country you visit.’

line.words: Emil ama il suo gatto e comincia a fare le valigie subito. “Cosa stai facendo tesoro?” chiede la mamma. “Faccio un giro intorno al mondo per salvare il mio gatto” dice Emil.

subtitle.line: Emil elsker sin kat og begynder straks at pakke. “Hvad laver du skat? spørger hans mor”. “Jeg skal rejse rundt i verden for at redde min kat”, siger Emil. “OK skat. Husk at børste tænder”, siger hans mor.

Emiel is gek op zijn kat, en gaat meteen zijn koffer inpakken. ‘Wat doe je, lieverd?’ vraagt zijn moeder. ‘Ik ga de wereld rondreizen om mijn kat te zoeken’ zegt Emiel. ‘Ok lieverd. Vergeet je tandenborstel niet!’ zegt zijn moeder.

Emil loves his cat, and starts packing straight away. ‘What are you doing darling?’ asks his mum. ‘I’m going on a trip around the world to save my cat’ Emil says. ‘OK darling. Don’t forget to brush your teeth!’ says his mum.

Emil loves his cat, and starts packing straight away. ‘What are you doing darling?’ asks his mum. ‘I’m going on a trip around the world to save my cat’ Emil says. ‘OK darling. Don’t forget to brush your teeth!’ says his mum.

line.words: “D’accordo, tesoro. Non dimenticare di pulire le denti!” dice sua mamma.

subtitle.line: “OK skat. Husk at børste tænder”, siger hans mor.
‘Ok lieverd. Vergeet je tandenborstel niet!’ zegt zijn moeder.
‘OK darling. Don’t forget to brush your teeth!’ says his mum.
‘OK darling. Don’t forget to brush your teeth!’ says his mum.

line.words: Emil trova il suo passaporto. Lo mette in borsa. Emil trova i suoi soldi. Li mette in borsa. Emil trova il suo pallone. Lo mette in borsa. Emil trova il telefonino del suo padre. Lo mette in borsa.

subtitle.line: Emil finder sit pas. Han lægger det ned i tasken.Emil finder sine penge. Han lægger dem ned i tasken.Emil finder sin fodbold. Han lægger den ned i tasken.Emil finder sin fars telefon. Han lægger den ned i tasken.

Emiel zoekt zijn paspoort. Hij stopt hem in zijn koffer.Emiel zoekt zijn geld. Hij stopt het in zijn koffer.Emiel zoekt zijn voetbal. Hij stopt hem in zijn koffer.Emiel zoekt zijn vaders telefoon. Hij stopt hem in zijn koffer.
Emil finds his passport. He puts it in his bag.Emil finds his money. He puts it in his bag.Emil finds his football. He puts it in his bag.Emil finds his dad’s telephone. He puts it in his bag.
Emil finds his passport. He puts it in his bag.Emil finds his money. He puts it in his bag.Emil finds his football. He puts it in his bag.Emil finds his dad’s telephone. He puts it in his bag.

line.words: Accende il computer e prenota un biglietto. Andrà in Inghilterra, poi negli Stati Uniti e poi in Australia.

subtitle.line: Han går hen til computeren og bestiller en billet. Han skal først til Spanien (Frankrig...), så til Mexico (Cameroon) og så Cuba (Martinique).
Hij loopt naar de computer en reserveert een ticket. Hij gaat naar Frankrijk, Mexico en daarna Cuba.
He goes to the computer and reserves a ticket. He is going to England, then the USA and then Australia.
He goes to the computer and reserves a ticket. He is going to England, then the USA and then Australia.

line.words: Parte da casa. “Ciao, mamma!” grida. “Ciao, tesoro! Buon divertimento a scuola.” dice sua mamma.

subtitle.line: Han går ud af huset. “Farvel mor”, siger han. “Farvel min skat! Hav en god dag i skolen”, siger hans mor.
Hij gaat weg. ‘Dag mam!’ roept hij. ‘Dag schat! Veel plezier op school’ zegt zijn moeder.
He leaves his house. ‘Bye mum!’ he calls. ‘Bye darling! Have a nice day at school.’ His mum says.
He leaves his house. ‘Bye mum!’ he calls. ‘Bye darling! Have a nice day at school.’ His mum says.

line.words: Va nel aeroporto e raccoglie il suo biglietto. Sale sul aereo. È nervoso ma molto eccitato.

subtitle.line: Han tager til lufthavnen og henter sin billet.Han kommer om bord på flyet. Han er nervøs og meget spændt.
Hij gaat naar het vliegveld en haalt zijn ticket op.Hij stapt op het vliegtuig. Hij is nerveus, maar hij heeft er ook veel zin in.
He goes to the airport and collects his ticket.He gets on the plane. He is nervous, but very excited.
He goes to the airport and collects his ticket.He gets on the plane. He is nervous, but very excited.

line.words: L’aereo decolla al aeroporto di Londra. L’aeroporto si chiama “Gatwick”. Poi Emil prende il metripolitano al centro città.

subtitle.line: Flyet lander i lufthavnen i London. Lufthavnen hedder Gatwick. Så tager Emil toget ind til byen.
Het vliegtuig landt op het vliegveld van London. Het vliegveld heet ‘Gatwick’ Dan neemt Emiel de metro naar de stad.
The plane lands at the airport in London. The airport is called ‘Gatwick’. Then Emil goes by tube into the city.
The plane lands at the airport in London. The airport is called ‘Gatwick’. Then Emil goes by tube into the city.

line.words: Emil si guarda attorno. Si è stupito dei vecchi edifici. “Guarda a quello!” dice. “Quello li si chiama Big Ben” dice un passante.

subtitle.line: Emil looks around. He is amazed at the old buildings. ‘Look at that!’ he says. ‘That one is called Big Ben’ says a passerby.
Emil looks around. He is amazed at the old buildings. ‘Look at that!’ he says. ‘That one is called Big Ben’ says a passerby.

line.words: Poi vede un ragazzo che sta per andare a scuola. “Ciao! Vai a scuola?” “Si” dice il ragazzo. “Vado in bici. Ho qualcosa per te.” Il ragazzo dà a Emil una foto strappata e va via.

subtitle.line: Then he sees a boy on his way to school. ‘Hello! Are you going to school?’ ‘Yes’ says the boy. ‘I go by bike. I have something for you.’ The boy gives Emil a torn photograph and rides off.
Then he sees a boy on his way to school. ‘Hello! Are you going to school?’ ‘Yes’ says the boy. ‘I go by bike. I have something for you.’ The boy gives Emil a torn photograph and rides off.

line.words: Emil mette la foto strappata in borsa con prudenza, va alla fermata di metro e prende il metripolitano fino al aeroporto. “Prossima fermata gli Stati Uniti!”

subtitle.line: Emil puts the torn photograph carefully into his bag, goes to the tube station and goes by tube to the airport. ‘Next stop USA!’
Emil puts the torn photograph carefully into his bag, goes to the tube station and goes by tube to the airport. ‘Next stop USA!’

line.words: Dopo un lungo volo Emil arriva al aeroporto.

subtitle.line: After a long flight Emil arrives at the airport.
After a long flight Emil arrives at the airport.

line.words: È la capitale degli Stati Uniti. Washington DC. La città è grande.

subtitle.line: It is the capital of the USA. Washington DC. The city is big.
It is the capital of the USA. Washington DC. The city is big.

line.words: Emil prende l’autobus nel centro città. Perchè viene chiamato Washington?” dice. “George Washington era un fondatore degli Stati Uniti” dice una signorina.

subtitle.line: Emil takes a bus into the city. Why is this city called ‘Washington?’ he says. ‘George Washington was one of the founders of the USA,’ says a lady.
Emil takes a bus into the city. Why is this city called ‘Washington?’ he says. ‘George Washington was one of the founders of the USA,’ says a lady.

line.words: Poi Emil vede una ragazza che passa vicino. Porta una divisa.

subtitle.line: Then Emil sees a girl walking past. She has a school uniform on.
Then Emil sees a girl walking past. She has a school uniform on.

line.words: “Ciao! Vai a scuola?” “Si” risponde la ragazza. “Vado a scuola a piedi. Ho qualcosa per te.” La ragazza dà un’altra foto strappata e se ne va.

subtitle.line: ‘Hello! Are you going to school?’ Yes says the girl. ‘I walk to school. I have something for you.’ The girl gives Emil another torn photograph and walks off.
‘Hello! Are you going to school?’ Yes says the girl. ‘I walk to school. I have something for you.’ The girl gives Emil another torn photograph and walks off.

line.words: Emil mette la foto strappata in borsa con prudenza, va alla prossima fermata d’autobus e prende l’autobus fino al aeroporto. “Prossima fermata Australia”.

subtitle.line: Emil puts the torn photograph carefully into his bag, goes to the bus stop and goes by bus to the airport. ‘Next stop Australia.’
Emil puts the torn photograph carefully into his bag, goes to the bus stop and goes by bus to the airport. ‘Next stop Australia.’

line.words: Dopo un lungo volo Emil arriva al aeroporto in Australia. Prende un tassi in centro città, Sydney.

subtitle.line: After a long flight Emil arrives at the airport in Australia. He takes a taxi to the city, Sydney.
After a long flight Emil arrives at the airport in Australia. He takes a taxi to the city Syndey.

line.words: Sydney fa caldo ed è molto occupato. Si trova sulla costa.

subtitle.line: Sydney is hot and busy. It is on the coast.
Sydney is hot and busy. It is on the coast.

line.words: Emil vede un edificio straordinario. “Qual’è quel edificio?” chiede. “Si chiama il teatro dell’opera di Sydney – aprì nel 1973” dice un passante.

subtitle.line: Emil sees an amazing building. ‘What is that building?’ he asks. ‘It is called the Sydney Opera House – it opened in 1973 ‘, says a passerby.
Emil sees an amazing building. ‘What is that building?’ he asks. ‘It is called the Sydney Opera House – it opened in 1973 ‘, says a passerby.

line.words: Poi Emil vede una ragazza che sta passando in tassi. Ha le trecce.

subtitle.line: Then Emil sees a girl passing in a taxi. She has plaits in her hair.
Then Emil sees a girl passing in a taxi. She has plaits in her hair.

line.words: “Ciao” vai a scuola?” Si, risponde la ragazza. “Vado a scuola in tassi. Ho qualcosa per te.” La ragazza dà ad Emil un’altra foto strappata e va via.

subtitle.line: ‘Hello! Are you going to school?’ Yes says the girl. ‘I go to school by taxi. I have something for you.’ The girl gives Emil another torn photograph and rides away.
‘Hello! Are you going to school?’ Yes says the girl. ‘I go to school by taxi. I have something for you.’ The girl gives Emil another torn photograph and rides away.

line.words: “Ora di tornare a casa! dice Emil. Prende un tassi fino al aeroporto – e prende l’aereo a casa.

subtitle.line: ‘Time to go home!’ Says Emil. He goes to the airport by taxi – and goes home by plane.
‘Hello! Are you going to school?’ Yes says the girl. ‘I go to school by taxi. I have something for you.’ The girl gives Emil another torn photograph and rides away.

line.words: Durante il volo Emil prende i tre pezzi di foto strappato. Vanno insieme come un puzzle. Guarda l’immagine con attenzione.

subtitle.line: On the aeroplane Emil takes out the 3 torn pieces of photograph. They match up like a puzzle! He looks carefully at the picture.
On the aeroplane Emil takes out the 3 torn pieces of photograph. They match up like a puzzle! He looks carefully at the picture.

line.words: L’immagine è di una ragazza – è sua vicina Juanita!

subtitle.line: The picture is of a girl – it’s his neighbour Juanita!
The picture is of a girl – it’s his neighbour Juanita!

line.words: Va direttamente da Juanita dal aeroporto. È tornata da scuola. “Ciao, Emil! Ecco il tuo gatto!”

subtitle.line: He goes straight to Juanita’s house from the airport. She is back from school. ‘Hi Emil! Your cat is here!’
He goes straight to Juanita’s house from the airport. She is back from school. ‘Hi Emil! Your cat is here!’

line.words: Emil è molto contento. Torna a casa con il suo gatto. “Ciao, tesoro” dice sua mamma. “Com’era scuola?”

subtitle.line: Emil is very happy. He goes home with his cat. ‘Hello darling’ says his mum. ‘How was school?’
Emil is very happy. He goes home with his cat. ‘Hello darling’ says his mum. ‘How was school?’
